arabicText: ۞ لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْجَهْرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
Allah does	 not	 like	 disclosure	 of	 evil	
matters	 except	 by	 the	 oppressed;	 and	
Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	pasand	nahiñ	kartā	buri	bāt	ka	ailān	
karna magar	mazloom	se	aur	Allah	sunta	
jānta	hai

arabicText: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ خَيْرًا أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ أَوْ تَعْفُوا۟ عَن سُوٓءٍۢ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّۭا قَدِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
If	you	do	any	good	openly	or	in	secret,	or	
pardon	someone’s	evil	- then	indeed	Allah
is	Oft	Forgiving,	Able.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	tum	koi	bhalāi	'alaniya	karo	ya	chup	
kar	 ya	 kisi	 ki	burāyi	se	dar-guzaro	 to	beshak	Allah	mua'āf	karne	wāla	qudrat	wāla	
hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكْفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن يُفَرِّقُوا۟ بَيْنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيَقُولُونَ نُؤْمِنُ بِبَعْضٍۢ وَنَكْفُرُ بِبَعْضٍۢ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن يَتَّخِذُوا۟ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ سَبِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 disbelieve	 in	 Allah and	 His	
Noble	 Messengers,	 and	 seek	 to	 cause	
division	 between	 Allah and	 His	 Noble	
Messengers,	and	say,	“We	believe	in	some	
and	 disbelieve	 in	 others,”	 and	 wish	 to	
choose	a	way	between	faith	and	disbelief;
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Allah	aur	us	 ke	Rasooloñ	 ko	nahi	
mānte	 aur	 chāhtē	 haiñ	 ke	 Allah	 se	 us	 ke	
Rasooloñ	 ko	judā	 kar	 deñ	aur	 kahte	 haiñ	
ham	kisi	par	Imān	lāye	aur	kisi	ke	munkir	
huye	 aur	 chāhte	 haiñ	 ke	 imān	 o	 kufr	 ke	
beech		meiñ	koi	rāh	nikāl	leñ

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًۭا مُّهِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	real	disbelievers;	and	for	the	
disbelievers	 We	 have	 kept	 prepared	 a	
disgraceful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahi haiñ	 theek	 theek	 kāfir	 aur	 ham	 ne	
kāfiroñ	 ke	 liye	 zillat	 ka	 ‘aƶāb tayyār	 kar	
rakhā	hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَلَمْ يُفَرِّقُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَوْفَ يُؤْتِيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	believe	in	Allah and	all	His	
Noble	 Messengers	 and	 do	 not	 make	 any	
distinction	in	belief	between	any	of	them	-
to	 them	 Allah will	 soon	 give	 them	 their	
reward;	 and	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Merciful
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahi haiñ	 theek	 theek	 kāfir	 aur	 ham	 ne	
kāfiroñ	 ke	 liye	 zillat	 ka	 ‘aƶāb tayyār	 kar	
rakhā	haiAur	woh	jo	Allah	aur	 us	 ke	 sab	Rasooloñ	
par	 Imān	 laāye	 aur	 un	 meiñ	 se	 kisi	 par	
imān	meiñ	farq	na	kiya	unheiñ	‘an-qareeb	
Allah	un	ke	sawāb	degā	aur	Allah	bakhsh
ne	wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُكَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ كِتَـٰبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ فَقَدْ سَأَلُوا۟ مُوسَىٰٓ أَكْبَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَرِنَا ٱللَّهَ جَهْرَةًۭ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ بِظُلْمِهِمْ ۚ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلْعِجْلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ فَعَفَوْنَا عَن ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him)	the	People	given	the	
Book(s)	ask	you,	to	cause	a	Book	to	be	sent	
down	on	them	from	heaven	- so	they	had	
asked	 something	 even	 greater	 from	Moosa,	 for	 they	 said,	 “Show	Allah to	 us,	 clearly”	- so	 the	
thunder	seized	them	on	account	of	their	sins;	then	they	chose	the	calf	(for	worship)	after	clear	
signs	had	come	to	them,	then	We	forgave	this;	and	We	bestowed	Moosa	with	a	clear	dominance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Mehboob!	 Ahle	 kitāb	 tum	 se	 suwāl	
karte	haiñ	ke	un	par	āsmān	se	ek	kitāb	utār	
do	woh	to	Mūsā	se	is	se	bhi	badā	suwāl	kar	chuke	ke	bole	hameiñ	Allah	ko	e'alāniyah	(zāhir	kar	
ke)	dikhā	do to	unheiñ	kadak	ne	āa	liya	un	ke	gunāhoñ	par	phir	bachdā	le	baithē		B'ad	is	ke	roshan	
āyatieñ	un	ke	pās	āa	chukiñ	to	ham	ne	yeh	mua'āf	farma	diya	Aur	ham	ne	Mūsā	ko	raushan	ghalba	
diya

arabicText: وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَهُمُ ٱلطُّورَ بِمِيثَـٰقِهِمْ وَقُلْنَا لَهُمُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْبَابَ سُجَّدًۭا وَقُلْنَا لَهُمْ لَا تَعْدُوا۟ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ وَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُم مِّيثَـٰقًا غَلِيظًۭا
englishTranslationText:
We	then	raised	the	mount	(Sinai)	above	them	to	take	a	covenant	from	them	and	decreed	them	
that,	“Enter	 the	gate	while	prostrating”	and	decreed	 them	 that,	“Do	not	cross	 the	limits	of	 the	
Sabbath,”	and	We	took	from	them	a	firm	covenant.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	ham	ne	un	par	Toor ko	uñchā	kiya un	se	‘ahad lene	ko	aur	un	se	farmāya	ke	darwāze	meiñ	
sajdah	karte	dākhil	ho	aur	un	se	farmāya	ke	hafte	meiñ	had	se	na	badho	aur	ham	ne	un	se	ghādhā
(pukhtah)	áhad		liya

arabicText: فَبِمَا نَقْضِهِم مِّيثَـٰقَهُمْ وَكُفْرِهِم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتْلِهِمُ ٱلْأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّۢ وَقَوْلِهِمْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلْفٌۢ ۚ بَلْ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهَا بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	 Allah cursed	 them	 because	 of	 their	
constantly	 breaking	 their	 covenant	- and	
they	disbelieved	in	the	signs	of	Allah,	and	
they	 used	 to	 wrongfully	 martyr	 the	
Prophets,	 and	 because	 they	 said,	 “Our	
hearts	are	covered”;	in	fact	Allah has	set	a	
seal	 upon	 their	 hearts	 due	 to	 their	
disbelief,	so	 that	 they	do	not	accept	 faith,	
except	a	few
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	un	ki	kaisi bad	'ahadiyoñ	ke	sabab	ham	
ne	un	par	l'anat	ki	aur	is	liye	ke	woh	Āyāte-Ilāhi	ke	munkir	huye	aur	Ambiyā	ko	nāhaq	shaheed	karte	aur	un	ke	is	kahne	par	
ke	diloñ	par	ghilāf	haiñ	balke	Allah	ne	un	
ke	 kufr	 ke	 sabab	 un	 ke	 diloñ	 par	 mohar	
lagā	di	hai	to	Imān	nahi	lāate	magar	thode

arabicText: بِمَا نَقْضِهِم مِّيثَـٰقَهُمْ وَكُفْرِهِم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتْلِهِمُ ٱلْأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّۢ وَقَوْلِهِمْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلْفٌۢ ۚ بَلْ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهَا بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 because	 they	 disbelieved	 and	
slandered	 Maryam	 with	 a	 tremendous	
accusation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 is	 liye	 ke	 unhoñ	 ne	 kufr	 kiya	 aur	
Maryam par	badā	bohtān	uthāya (bāñdha)

arabicText: وَقَوْلِهِمْ إِنَّا قَتَلْنَا ٱلْمَسِيحَ عِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ وَمَا صَلَبُوهُ وَلَـٰكِن شُبِّهَ لَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ لَفِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهُ ۚ مَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ إِلَّا ٱتِّبَاعَ ٱلظَّنِّ ۚ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ يَقِينًۢا
englishTranslationText:
And	because	they	said,	“We	have	killed	the	
Messiah,	 Eisa	 the	 son	 of	 Maryam,	 the	
Messenger	of	Allah”;	they	did	not	slay	him	
nor	did	 they	crucify	him,	but	a	look-alike	
was	 created	 for	 them;	 and	 those	 who	
disagree	concerning	it	are	in	doubt	about	
it;	 they	 know	 nothing	 of	 it,	 except	 the	
following	 of	 assumptions;	 and	 without	
doubt,	they	did	not	kill	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	ke	is	kahne	par	ke	ham	ne	Maseeh
Ísā	bin	Maryam Allah	ke	Rasool	ko	shaheed	
kiya aur	yeh	hai	ke	unhoñ	ne	Na	usey	qatl	
kiya	aur	Na	usey	sooli	di	balke	un	ke	liye	us	
ki	 shabeeh	 (shakl-o-Soorat)	 ka	 ek	 banā	
diya	gaya	aur	woh	jo	us	ke	bāre	me	ikhtelāf	
kar	rahe	haiñ	zaroor		us	ki	taraf	se	shubhe	
me	 pade	 huye	 haiñ	 unheñ	 us	 ki	 kuch	 bhi	
khabar	 nahi	magar	 yahi	 gumān	 ki	 pairwi	
Aur	be-shak	unhoñ	ne	us	ko	qatal	na	kiya

arabicText: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْهِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
In	 fact	Allah raised	him	 towards	Himself;	
and	Allah is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	Allah	ne	usse	apni	taraf	uthā	liya	aur	
Allah	ghālib	Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَإِن مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِلَّا لَيُؤْمِنَنَّ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ مَوْتِهِۦ ۖ وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
There	 is	 not	 one	 of	 the	 People	 given	 the	
Book(s),	who	will	not	believe	in	him	(Eisa)	
before	 his	 death;	 and	 on	 the	 Day	 of	
Resurrection	he	will	be	a	witness	against	
them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Koi	kitābi	aisa	nahi	jo	us	ki	mout	se	pahle	
us	par	Imān	na	lāye	aur	Qayāmat	ke	din	un	
par	gawah	hogā

arabicText: فَبِظُلْمٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ طَيِّبَـٰتٍ أُحِلَّتْ لَهُمْ وَبِصَدِّهِمْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	due	to	the	great	injustices	committed	by	
the	 Jews,	 We	 forbade	 them	 some	 of	 the	
good	 things	 which	 were	 earlier	lawful	 for	
them,	and	because	they	prevented	many	people	from	Allah’s	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Yahūdiyoñ	ke	bade	zulm	ke	sabab	ham	
ne	woh	b'az	suthri	cheezieñ	ke	un	ke	liye	
halāl	thiñ	un	par	harām	farma	deiñ	aur	is	liye	ke	inhoñ	ne	bohutoñ (bohut	se	logoñ)	ko	Allah	ki	
rāah	se	rokā

arabicText: وَأَخْذِهِمُ ٱلرِّبَوٰا۟ وَقَدْ نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَكْلِهِمْ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ ۚ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 because	 they	 used	 to	 take	 usury	whereas	 they	were forbidden	 from	it,	and	 they	 used	 to	
wrongfully	devour	people’s	wealth;	and	for	the	disbelievers	among	them,	We	have	kept	prepared	
a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	is	liye	ke	woh	sood	lete	hālāñ	ke	woh	is	se	man'a	kiye	gaye	they	aur	logoñ	ka	māal	nā-haq	
khā	jāte	aur	un	me	jo	kāfir	huye ham	ne	un	ke	liye	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb tayyār	kar	rakhā	hai.

arabicText: لَّـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّٰسِخُونَ فِى ٱلْعِلْمِ مِنْهُمْ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَٱلْمُقِيمِينَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۚ وَٱلْمُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَنُؤْتِيهِمْ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
But	those	among	them	who	are	firm	in	knowledge	and	who	have	faith,	believe	in	what	is	sent	
down	upon	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	and	what	was	
sent	down	before	you,	and	those	who	keep	the	prayer	established	and	those	who	pay	the	charity,	
and	those	who	believe	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day;	to	such,	We	shall	soon	bestow	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	jo	un	meiñ	‘ilm	me	pakke	aur	Imān	wāle	haiñ	woh	Imān	lāte	haiñ	us	par	 Jo	aey	Mehboob
tumhāri	taraf	utra	aur	jo	tum	se	pahle	utra	aur	Namāz	qāyim	rakhne	wāle	aur	Zak'āt	dene	wāle	
aur	Allah	aur	Qayāmat	par	imān	lāne		wāle	aisoñ	ko	‘an-qareeb	ham	bada	sawāb	deñge.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ كَمَآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍۢ وَٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ ۚ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَٱلْأَسْبَاطِ وَعِيسَىٰ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُونُسَ وَهَـٰرُونَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ وَءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	We	sent	a	divine	revelation	to	you	
(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessing	
be	 upon	 him)	 as	 We	 did	 send	 divine	
revelations	 to	 Nooh	 (Noah)	 and	 the	
Prophets	 after	 him;	 and	 We	 sent	 divine	
revelations	 to	 Ibrahim	 (Abraham)	 and	
Ismael	 (Ishmael)	 and	 Ishaq	 (Isaac)	 and	
Yaqub	(Jacob)	and	their	offspring,	and	Eisa	
(Jesus)	and	Ayyub	(Job)	and	Yunus	(Jonah)	
and	 Haroon	 (Aaron)	 and	 Sulaiman	
(Solomon),	 and	 We	 bestowed	 the	 Zaboor	
(the	Holy	Book)	upon	Dawud	(David).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	jo	un	meiñ	‘ilm	me	pakke	aur	Imān	wāle	haiñ	woh	Imān	lāte	haiñ	us	par	 Jo	aey	Mehboob
tumhāri	taraf	utra	aur	jo	tum	se	pahle	utra	aur	Namāz	qāyim	rakhne	wāle	aur	Zak'āt	dene	wāle	
aur	Allah	aur	Qayāmat	par	imān	lāne		wāle	aisoñ	ko	‘an-qareeb	ham	bada	sawāb	deñge.

arabicText: وَرُسُلًۭا قَدْ قَصَصْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَيْكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَرُسُلًۭا لَّمْ نَقْصُصْهُمْ عَلَيْكَ ۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكْلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	 the	 Noble	 Messengers	 whom	 We	
have	mentioned	to	you	before,	and	to	the	
Noble	Messengers	We	have	not	mentioned	
to	you;	and	Allah really	did	speak	to	Moosa.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Rasooloñ	ko	jin	ka	Ƶikr	āge	ham	tum	se	
farma	chuke	aur	un	ko	jin	ka	Ƶikr	tum	se	na	
farmāya	aur	Allah	ne	Mūsā se	haqeeqatan	
kalām	farmāya

arabicText: رُّسُلًۭا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةٌۢ بَعْدَ ٱلرُّسُلِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Noble	Messengers	giving	glad	 tidings	and	
declaring	 warnings,	 in	 order	 that	 people	
may	not	have	any	argument	against	Allah,	
after	 the	 (advent	 of)	 Noble	 Messengers;	
and	Allah is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Rasool	 khush	 khabri	 dete	 aur	 dar	 sunāte	
ke	Rasooloñ	ke	b'ad	Allah	ke	yahāñ	logoñ	
ko	koi	‘uzr	na	rahe	aur	Allah	ghālib	Hikmat	
wāla	hai

arabicText: لَّـٰكِنِ ٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ إِلَيْكَ ۖ أَنزَلَهُۥ بِعِلْمِهِۦ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَشْهَدُونَ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
But	 Allah is	 the	 Witness	 of	 what	 He	 has	
sent	down	upon	you	- He	has	sent	it	down	
by	 His	 knowledge;	 and	 the	 angels	 are	
witnesses;	 and	 sufficient	 is	 Allah’s	
testimony
romanUrduTranslationText:
Lekin	aey	Mehboob Allah	is	ka	gawah	hai	jo	
us	ne	tumhāri	taraf	utāra	woh	us	ne	apne	
ílm	 se	 utāra	 hai	 aur	 Farishte	 gawah	 haiñ	
aur	Allah	ki	gawāhi	kāfi

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	disbelieved	and	prevented	(others)	from	the	way	of	Allah,	have	undoubtedly	
wandered	far	astray.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	Aur	Allah	ki	rāah	
se	roka	be-shak	woh	door	ki	gumrāhi	me	
pade

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَظَلَمُوا۟ لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَلَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ طَرِيقًا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	disbelieved	and	crossed	the	limits	- Allah will	never	forgive	them,	nor	guide	
them	to	a	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya		aur	had	se	bade	Allah	hargiz	unheñ	na	bakhshegā	na	unheñ	koi	rāah	
dikhāye

arabicText: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText: Except	the	path	of	hell,	in	which	they	will	remain	for	ever	and	ever;	and	that	is	easy	for	Allah
romanUrduTranslationText: Magar	Jahannam	ka	rāsta	ke	us	meiñ	hamesha	hamesha	raheñge	aur	ye	Allah	ko	āasān	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ بِٱلْحَقِّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ خَيْرًۭا لَّكُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	mankind!	This	Noble	Messenger	(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	has	
come	 to	 you	 with	 the	 truth	 from	 your	 Lord,	 so	 accept	 faith	 for	 your	 own	 good;	 and	 if	 you	
disbelieve,	then	undoubtedly	to	Allah only	belongs	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	in	the	earth;	
and	Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	logoñ	tumhāre	pās	yeh	Rasool	haq	ke	sāth	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	tashreef	lāye	to	Imān	lāo	
apne	bhale	ko	aur	agar	tum	kufr	karo	to	be-shak	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	
meiñ	hai	aur	Allah	Ílm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا تَغْلُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ ۚ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ وَكَلِمَتُهُۥٓ أَلْقَىٰهَآ إِلَىٰ مَرْيَمَ وَرُوحٌۭ مِّنْهُ ۖ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۖ وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ ثَلَـٰثَةٌ ۚ ٱنتَهُوا۟ خَيْرًۭا لَّكُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا ٱللَّهُ إِلَـٰهٌۭ وَٰحِدٌۭ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌۭ ۘ لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Do	 not	
exaggerate	 in	 your	 religion	 nor	 say	
anything	 concerning	Allah,	 but	 the	 truth;	
the	 Messiah,	 Eisa the	 son	 of	 Maryam,	 is	
purely	a	Noble	Messenger	of	Allah,	and	His	
Word;	 which	 He	 sent	 towards	 Maryam,	
and	a	Spirit	 from	Him;	so	believe	in	Allah
and	His	Noble	Messengers;	and	do	not	say	
“Three”;	 desist,	 for	 your	 own	 good;	
undoubtedly	 Allah is	 the	 only	 One	 God;	
Purity	is	to	Him	from	begetting	a	child;	to	
Him	 only	 belongs	 all	 whatever	 is	 in	 the	
heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	earth;	
and	Allah is	a	Sufficient	Trustee	(of	affairs).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Kitāb	wālo	apne	deen	me	ziyādati	na	
karo	 aur Allah	 par	 na	 kaho	 magar	 sach	
Maseeh ‘Isā Maryam ka	 beta	 Allah	 ka	
Rasool	 hi	 hai	 aur	 uska	 ek	 kalima	 ke	
Maryam ki	 taraf	bheja	aur	us	ke	yahāñ	ki	
ek	Rooh	 to	 Allah	 aur	 us	 ke	Rasooloñ	 par	
imān	lāo		aur	teen	na	kaho	b’az	raho	apne	
bhale ko	Allah	to	ek	hi	Khuda	hai	pāki	usey	
is	se	ke	uske	koi	bachcha	ho	usi	ka	māl	hai	
jo	 āsmānoñ	 me	 hai	 aur	 jo	 kuch	 zameen	
meiñ	aur	Allah	 kāfi	 kārsāz (kāam	 banāne	
wāla)	hai

arabicText: لَّن يَسْتَنكِفَ ٱلْمَسِيحُ أَن يَكُونَ عَبْدًۭا لِّلَّهِ وَلَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَسْتَنكِفْ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيَسْتَكْبِرْ فَسَيَحْشُرُهُمْ إِلَيْهِ جَمِيعًۭا
englishTranslationText:
The	 Messiah	 does	 not	 at	 all	 hate	 being	 a	
bondman	 of	 Allah,	 and	 nor	 do	 the	 close	
angels;	 and	 whoever	 hates	 worshipping	
Him	and	is	conceited	- so	very	soon	He	will	
gather	them	all	towards	Him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hargiz	Maseeh Allah	 ka	 bandah	 banne	 se	
kuch	 nafrat	 nahi	 karta	 aur	 na	 muqarrab	
Farishte aur	jo	Allah	 ki	 bandagi	 se	 nafrat	
aur	 takabbur	 kare	 to	 koi	 dum	jāta	 hai	 ke	
woh	un	sab	ko	apni	taraf	hāñkega

arabicText: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ ۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَنكَفُوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فَيُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Then	to	those	who	believed	and	did	good	
deeds,	He	will	pay	their	wages	in	 full	and	
by	His	munificence,	give	them	more;	and	to	
those	 who	 hated	 (worshipping	 Him)	 and	
were	 proud,	 He	 will	 inflict	 a	 painful	
punishment;	 and	 they	 will	 not	 find	 for	
themselves,	 other	 than	 Allah,	 any	
supporter	nor	any	aide
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	woh	jo	imān	lāye	aur	achche	kāam	kiye	un	ki	mazdoori	unheñ	bharpoor	de	kar	apne	fazl	se	
unheñ	aur	ziyāda	de	gā	aur	woh	jinhoñ	ne	nafrat	aur	takabbur	kiya	tha	unheñ	dard-nāk	sazā	dega	
aur Allah	ke	siwā	na	apna	koi	himāyati	payeñge	na	madadgār

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُم بُرْهَـٰنٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَأَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ نُورًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	mankind!	Indeed	the	clear	proof	from	your	Lord	has	come	to	you,	and	We	have	sent	down	to	
you	a bright	light.	(The	Holy	Prophet	is	a	Clear	Proof	from	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	logoñ	 be-shak	 tumhāre	 pās	Allah	 ki	 taraf	 se	wāzeh	 daleel	āayi	aur	 ham	 ne	 tumhāri	 taraf	
Raushan	Noor utāra

arabicText: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱعْتَصَمُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَسَيُدْخِلُهُمْ فِى رَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنْهُ وَفَضْلٍۢ وَيَهْدِيهِمْ إِلَيْهِ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	those	who	believed	in	Allah and	held	fast	to	His	rope	- He	will	admit	them	into	His	mercy	and	
munificence,	and	will	guide	them	on	the	Straight	Path	towards	Himself.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	woh	jo	Allah	par	Imān	laāye	aur	us	ki	Rassi	mazboot	thāmi	to	‘an-qareeb	Allah	unheñ	apni	
Rehmat	aur	apne	fazl	meiñ	dākhil	karega	aur	unheñ	apni	taraf	seedhi	rāh	dikhāye	gā

arabicText: يَسْتَفْتُونَكَ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفْتِيكُمْ فِى ٱلْكَلَـٰلَةِ ۚ إِنِ ٱمْرُؤٌا۟ هَلَكَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌۭ وَلَهُۥٓ أُخْتٌۭ فَلَهَا نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ ۚ وَهُوَ يَرِثُهَآ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهَا وَلَدٌۭ ۚ فَإِن كَانَتَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُمَا ٱلثُّلُثَانِ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ۚ وَإِن كَانُوٓا۟ إِخْوَةًۭ رِّجَالًۭا وَنِسَآءًۭ فَلِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۗ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ أَن تَضِلُّوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	they	ask	you	 for	a	
decree;	say,	“Allah decrees	you	concerning	
the	 solitary	 person	 (without	 parents	 or	
children);	if	a	man	dies	childless	and	has	a	
sister,	 for	her	is	half	 the	inheritance;	and	
the	man	is	his	sister’s	heir	if	the	sister	dies	
childless;	and	if	 there	are	 two	 sisters,	 for	
them	is	two-thirds	of	the	inheritance;	so	if	
there	 are	 brothers	 and	 sisters,	 both	 men	
and	 women,	 the	 male’s	 share	 is	 equal	 to	
that	 of	 two	 females;	 and	 Allah explains	
clearly	to	you,	so	that	you	do	not	go	astray;	
and	Allah knows	all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob tum	se	fatwa	pooñchte	haiñ	
tum	 farma	 do	 ke	 Allah	 tumhieñ	 kalālah	
maiñ	 fatwa	 deta	 hai	 agar	 kisi	 mard	 ka	
intiqāl	 ho	 jo	 be-awlād	 hai	 aur	 us	 ki	 ek	
bahan	ho	to	tarke	meiñ	se	us	ki	bahan	ka	
āadha	 hai	 aur	mard	 apni	 bahan	 ka	 wāris	
hogā	agar	bahan	ki	awlād	na	ho;	phir	agar	
do	bahnieñ	ho	tarke	meiñ	un	ka	do	tehāyi	
aur	 agar	 bhai	 bahan	 hoñ	 mard	 bhi	 aur	
auratieñ	bhi	to	mard	ka	hiss	do	auratoñ	ke	
barābar Allah	 tumhāre	 liye	 sāf	 bayān	
farmāta	hai	ke	kahiñ	bahak	na	jao	aur	Allah	
har	cheez	jāntā	hai
